# AI SDK Components

AI SDK components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [AI SDK](https://ai-sdk.dev/).

## Components

- PromptInput - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/prompt-input)
- ChainOfThought - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/chain-of-thought)
- Checkpoint - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/checkpoint)
- Confirmation - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/confirmation)
- Context - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/context)
- Conversation - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/conversation)
- Message - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/message)
- ModelSelection - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/model-selection)
- Planning - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/plan)
- Queue - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/queue)
- Reasoning - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/reasoning)
- Suggestion - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/suggestion)
- Task - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/task)
- Tool - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/tool)
- InlineCitation - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/inline-citation)
- Sources - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/sources)
- Canvas - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/canvas)
- Connection - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/connection)
- Controls - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/controls)
- Edge - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/edge)
- Node - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/node)
- Panel - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/panel)
- Toolbar - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/toolbar)
- Shimmer - [Source](https://ai-sdk.dev/elements/components/shimmer)
